author: muddlebee
content:
hey rakesh üëã  Sorry to hear this. 

Ethereum Foundation has a Ethereum Improvement Proposal(EIP) repository https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs which describe standards for the Ethereum platform, including core protocol specifications, client APIs, and contract standards. 

Anyone can propose their ideas to enhance/improve the Ethereum platform. Feel free to explore and if you are looking for a beginner-friendly channel for EIP discussion, you are most welcome at Ethereum Cats & Herders which is an integral part of Ethereum R&D https://discord.gg/xzqqu49BYq


Also recently EIP-4361, related to authentication took off and got merged at the EIP Github repo. It could help you start off. 
EIP-4361 ‚û°Ô∏è  Sign-In with Ethereum describes how Ethereum accounts authenticate with off-chain services by signing a standard message format parameterized by scope, session details, and security mechanisms https://twitter.com/BrantlyMillegan/status/1471868488679575558?t=GA8pAQaIJS3GRqQBkKGQQA&s=19
